subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick began his bid for a record fifth title at Queen’s Club in London by defeating the 2010 semifinalist Feliciano López, 7-6 (2), 6-7 (5), 6-4.
snippet: Andy Roddick began his bid for a record fifth title at Queen’s Club in London by defeating the 2010 semifinalist Feliciano López, 7-6 (2), 6-7 (5), 6-4.
